*div1 type="summary"* *p*J. Tate to Austin, February 27, 1827. Proposal to establish a sugar mill in return for land.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Naggaitotches*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="02-27-1827">Feby. 27th 1827.*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Col. Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned*,*/p*
*p*Sir On the subject of a conversation I had with you at this place I beg leave to have liberty of submitting the following observations to your consideration and remarks thereon—*/p*
*p*Having reported myself to you with a wish to become a *person_mentioned*settler */person_mentioned*but from various adverse occurrences in my business has as yet prevented My making a permanent settlement in your *location_mentioned*colony*/location_mentioned*, although I have made a selection of Land partly in yours and in *person_mentioned*leftwicks */person_mentioned*but from an interruption in the *location_mentioned*settlement */location_mentioned*on the land by the *person_mentioned*indians */person_mentioned*I have changed my views which can only be realised by your approbation. To constitute the plan I would propose to select a *location_mentioned*League of land */location_mentioned*for Myself *location_mentioned*adjoining some of your reserve lands*/location_mentioned* most properly adapted to the cultivation of sugar Cane that you would add a *location_mentioned*league of your land*/location_mentioned* or more if thought necessary to effect the purpose; that complete Titles be made out to satisfy any person that it would be proper to make interrested in order to raise a fund sufficient to accomplish the establishment of *location_mentioned*sugar Manufactory*/location_mentioned* upon a respectable scale, If funds in *person_mentioned*negro slaves */person_mentioned*and mony could be obtained by a sale of the land before named It would certainly be favorable, but if not to make some *person_mentioned*capitalists */person_mentioned*Interrested who would be willing to invest for that purpose, If neither of the foregoing plans would be easily obtained raise such a fund out of said land in either of the proposed ways as would effect the establishment out of the Labour of *person_mentioned*free people of Color*/person_mentioned*, as would I believe be cheaper and much easier effected by holding out inducements to them after the term of their service would expire if it had been faithfully accomplished, such for instance as a labour [labor] or any other quantity Allowed by government to such *person_mentioned*men of good habits*/person_mentioned*—A question may arise on the policy or legallity of introducing the last named class of *person_mentioned*servants*/person_mentioned* this sir is entirely submitted to you as the Legitimate organ of the Government by whom I am to be officially informed on that subject and every other regulation necessary to be observed in the introduction whether by land or water whether certificates of character and generaly what would be the requisite formality to be observed by the inporter etc*/p*
*p*Plan of the Project*/p*
*p*Yourself *location_mentioned*two Leagues*/location_mentioned* that May in the Eastern Market Either in goods or money be worth $1 pr. *p*13,500 00*/p* *p*For *person_mentioned*Slaves */person_mentioned*bought in *location_mentioned*U. S*/location_mentioned*. or *location_mentioned*N. D.*/location_mentioned* If money could be obtd- 20 *person_mentioned*Men*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*women */person_mentioned*delivered at *location_mentioned*Brasos */location_mentioned*each 400$____________________$8000.00*/p*
*p*Leaving this sums to buy land and pay cont. Expences Care tools $60- 5500. 00*/p*
*p*13, 500.00*/p* *p*To remove *person_mentioned*freemen */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*women */person_mentioned*It might Probably Cost to deliver 80 the sum of__________________________________8000. 00*/p*
*p*Left to Apply to other Expence__________________________5500*/p*
*p*13, 500.00*/p* *p*All wishes submitted with great respect*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*J. Tate*/person_mentioned**/p*
